column2: let's talk "libations." I've been on an aperol kick lately
column7: and citrus. I got plenty of the sweet woody bourbon and nutty amaro
column8: but the characteristic bitterness of the aperol was missing and the orange was a bit overpowering. The Old Fashioned was great
column9: no complains whatsoever. We also shared a whiskey flight after our meal which was decent
column10: but we were a little disappointed in the overly judicious half-shot pours (3 varieties for $24).
